member.name: T:Athena.LogChannel.AthenaChannel
member.summary: Implements a log channel that can be used by the Zeus.Log dll to log messages.

member.name: F:Athena.LogChannel.AthenaChannel.m_WcfClient
member.summary: The WCF client that communicates with the Athena WCF server.

member.name: F:Athena.LogChannel.AthenaChannel.c_ServerIpAddressKey
member.summary: The key of the settings value that contains information about the Athena WCF server IP address.

member.name: F:Athena.LogChannel.AthenaChannel.c_ServerCommunicationTimeout
member.summary: The key of the setting value that contains information avout the communication timeout with the server.

member.name: M:Athena.LogChannel.AthenaChannel.Initialize(Zeus.Data.DataStore)
member.param: The object that contains channel settings.

member.name: M:Athena.LogChannel.AthenaChannel.WriteMessage(Zeus.Log.LogMessage)
member.summary: Writes a new message on the Athena log server.
member.param: The message that has to be processed.
